title: George Saunders on Lincoln and Lost Souls
description: George Saunders talks about “Lincoln in the Bardo”; Alan Burdick on “Why Times Flies”; and Maria Russo discusses Laura Ingalls Wilder and the “Little House” books.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
